dcterms:description: A common benchmark for multi-agent reinforcement learning (MARL) that evaluates the performance of algorithms in micromanagement tasks within the StarCraft II environment.
dcterms:title: StarCraft II micromanagement testbed

dcterms:description: A set of StarCraft II micromanagement games designed to evaluate how well independent agents can cooperate to solve complex tasks.
dcterms:title: SMAC (StarCraft Multi-Agent Challenge)

dcterms:description: Games within the StarCraft II environment that focus on micromanagement tasks, used to benchmark various reinforcement learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: StarCraft II micromanagement games
